response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you. I am offering it to you for $11,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between the intrinsic value and the perceived value.
